Arrive & Drive

Options available from £22 per driver.

Arrive and Drive is for you to come and hone your skills in the Practice Lap Sessions. We can run children as low as 8 years old in the mid-week off peak times between 10.00am – 6.00pm Monday – Friday, and at 11:00am on Sundays.

For drivers aged 12yrs+, you can go on the track at anytime as long as it is available but please book to avoid disappointment.

Time limits apply during our peak times and busy periods.

We have Junior Karting for 8 – 12 year olds Saturday mornings at 10.00am or during midweek from 10.00am - 6:00pm. This is purely for this peer group, so please book in advance.

PLEASE NOTE: All drivers require a Balaclava and Gloves for hygiene reasons. Feel free to bring your own, or we can supply them for £2.50 per item.

Standard 160cc adult karts are available for £5 less at selected times for 14yrs+.

About Us

Fastlane Karting is located in Fenton, Stoke on Trent, Staffordshire and within easy driving distance of Shropshire, Cheshire and Derbyshire in the East Midlands. We operate Sodi karts for corporate, group parties and arrive & drive sessions. We also have Cadet karts for juniors.

Address
  • Fastlane Karting
  • 151 King Street
  • Stoke On Trent
  • Staffordshire
